alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Bradford, northern St. Johns, southern Baker, northeastern Union, northern Clay and southern Duval Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mandarin to near Middleburg to near Sanderson. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Raiford, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Middleburg, World Golf Village, Nocatee, Oakleaf Plantation and Cecil Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval
